name: StringUtilTest
description: Unit tests for StringUtil class, focusing on various string manipulation and validation methods.

test_cases.name: join
test_cases.description: Tests the join functionality of StringUtil, ensuring it correctly concatenates list elements with a given delimiter.

test_cases.name: padding
test_cases.description: Tests the padding functionality of StringUtil, ensuring it correctly generates strings of spaces with specified lengths.

test_cases.name: paddingInACan
test_cases.description: Tests the memoization of padding strings in StringUtil, ensuring the correct lengths are maintained.

test_cases.name: isBlank
test_cases.description: Tests the isBlank functionality of StringUtil, ensuring it correctly identifies blank strings.

test_cases.name: isNumeric
test_cases.description: Tests the isNumeric functionality of StringUtil, ensuring it correctly identifies numeric strings.

test_cases.name: isWhitespace
test_cases.description: Tests the isWhitespace functionality of StringUtil, ensuring it correctly identifies whitespace characters.

test_cases.name: normaliseWhiteSpace
test_cases.description: Tests the normaliseWhitespace functionality of StringUtil, ensuring it correctly normalizes sequences of whitespace characters.

test_cases.name: normaliseWhiteSpaceHandlesHighSurrogates
test_cases.description: Tests the normaliseWhitespace functionality of StringUtil with high surrogate characters, ensuring correct handling.

test_cases.name: resolvesRelativeUrls
test_cases.description: Tests the resolve functionality of StringUtil, ensuring it correctly resolves relative URLs.

test_cases.name: stripsControlCharsFromUrls
test_cases.description: Tests the resolve functionality of StringUtil, ensuring it correctly strips control characters from URLs.

test_cases.name: allowsSpaceInUrl
test_cases.description: Tests the resolve functionality of StringUtil, ensuring it correctly handles URLs with spaces.

test_cases.name: isAscii
test_cases.description: Tests the isAscii functionality of StringUtil, ensuring it correctly identifies ASCII strings.
